name: Appleseed
description:
After being dragged into Wonderland by corrupted Soul-diers, Elise and her guardian teddy bear Appleseed must work together to escape the dungeon and return to the Human World! 

This is a short action-adventure game with some light puzzle elements where you control two characters, Elise and Appleseed, at the same time! Elise can fire magic rose thorns, and throw Appleseed around. Appleseed can take down enemies and has more options to avoid detection! 

The whole world is wrapped up in an "entertainment themed" aesthetic, so expect some lights, cameras, and swing-jazz music!

*THIS GAME IS BEST PLAYED ON A CONTROLLER* There are keyboard controls but you will get the best enjoyment when playing on a controller(Xbox One, PS4, and some more official  Gamepads work best).

This is more like Appleseed: Act 1, with the possibility of expansion should there be enough interest :D I already have a lot of ideas for other worlds and characters!
